resources.string: Enter your registered mobilenumber and email below :
Dont have an account? Sign up now
Q.1 How will the training be delivered?

string.name: Answer1
string.br: A.1 You will taught using pre-recorded videos and
text tutorials.The training has quizzes, assignments,
and tests to help you learn better.At the end of the
practise of what you learn during your training.

resources.string: Q.2 What will be the training of thr training?

string.name: Answer2
string.br: A.2 As this is a purely online training program, you
can choose to learn at any time of the day.We will
recommended a pace to be followed throughout the
program, but the actual timing and learning hours can
be decided by students according to their convenience.

resources.string: Q.3 What is the duration of training?
A.3 The training duration is of 6 weeks.
Q.4 How much time should I spend everyday

string.name: Answer4
string.br: A.4 We recommend spending 10-12 hours per week.
However, the actual learning hours can be decided by

resources.string: Q.5 When can I start my training

string.name: Answer5
string.br: A.5 You can choose your preferred batch date while signing up for the training program
